name: Problems Seen and Unseen
description:
Play as Dumaka, the most helpful elephant as he tries to fix the circus before the show starts in spite of his bad eyesight. This game was built with the thought of inclusivity for those with bad eyesight.  Can you find and fix all the problems before the circus starts?

Credits:

Autumn Slade > Visuals (animations, models, textures)

Theoden Swaby > Brainstorming, support

Scott Rose > Code

Credit to Serge Quadrado for his music (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/serge-quadrado)
